original_text:
Whom are you mocking?
    Against whom do you open your mouth wide
    and stick out your tongue?
Are you not children of transgression,
    the offspring of deceit,
korean_text: 너희가 누구를 희롱하느냐 누구를 향하여 입을 크게 벌리며 혀를 내미느냐 너희는 패역의 자식, 거짓의 후손이 아니냐

sentences.original_text: Against whom do you open your mouth wide
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 누구를 향하여 입을 크게 벌리느냐

sentences.original_text: Are you not children of transgression
